definition: lacking physical movement skills, especially with the hands
details:
adjective
- lacking physical movement skills, especially with the hands
= synonyms: bumbling
- ironically ambiguous
= example: ironically ambiguous
- rotating to the left
= synonyms: levorotary, levorotatory
- (of marriages) of a marriage between one of royal or noble birth and one of lower rank
= synonyms: morganatic
- (of marriages) illicit or informal
= example: (of marriages) illicit or informal
- using or intended for the left hand
= example: using or intended for the left hand
